definition[0]: if a liquid crystallizes, it forms crystals
example[0]: The liquid will crystallize at 50 degrees centigrade.
definition[1]: if an idea, plan etc crystallizes or is crystallized, it becomes very clear in your mind
example[1]: Inside her a thought was crystallizing.
definition[2]: to obtain or lose an amount of money
example[2]: The failure of the shipping company would have crystallized large losses and put the bankâ€™s survival in doubt.
